sentence.Network_en: In case you think I was incautious, take a look at the map.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你认为我不够仔细，就自己看看地图。

sentence.Network_en: Their incautious use can lead to wholly misleading results.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们轻易的应用将会得到错误的结论.

sentence.Network_en: She looked round for Gerald, fearing he might be already there, he was incautious and eager.
sentence.Network_cn: 她环视着寻找杰拉尔德, 恐怕他已经到了, 他是莽撞的,并且心急如焚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: on the pattern of Latin incautus

entry.tran: 不谨慎的;粗心大意的;轻率的
entry.def: If you say that someone is incautious, you are criticizing them because they do or say something without thinking or planning.

example.ex: In case you think I was incautious, take a look at the map.
example.tran: 如果你认为我不够仔细,就自己看看地图。

sentences.sentence: "an incautious step sent her headlong down the stairs"
"spilled the beans in an incautious moment"
